system.description: This spell turns natural, uncut or unworked rock of any sort into an equal volume of mud. Magical or enchanted stone is unaffected. The depth of the mud cannot exceed 10 feet. Creatures in the mud sink; they must make a DC 15 Reflex save each round or sink. Lava, magma, and similar materials are not affected. Transmute mud to rock reverses the effect.
system.target: Stone or stone object up to 40 cu. ft. + 10 cu. ft./level
